section.title: About Me
section.content: I am Fullstack Web Developer with a experience for developing modern and scalable Web Applications that can contribute to the efficiency and effectiveness of corporate success. I have strong background in Web Development and Computer Programming. You can download my CV for more information.

section.title: Backend Development
section.content: I have experience in backend development using Express.js for developing Web Apps and API's.

section.title: Frontend Development
section.content: I have experience in frontend development using React and Tailwind as frontend framework for developing SPA and Responsive UI.

section.title: Database Management
section.content: I have experience in creating and manipulating data in a PostgreSQL Relational Database and MongoDB NoSQL Database and ORM for Backend Technology.

section.title: Programming Technologies
section.content: I have experience in different programming languages like Python for Backend Development, JavaScript or TypeScript for Fullstack Development and Java or C# for developing Desktop Application.

experience.title: Web Application Developer
experience.description: Developing and maintaining a capstone project called QuickRev.

experience.title: System Developer
experience.description: Developing a booking and check-in system for ADC Hotel and Resort to manage guests data and reservation as a capstone project.

experience.title: Network Administrator Assistant
experience.description: Assisting a Network Administrator in managing and maintaining the college's network infrastructure, troubleshooting computer issues and cleaning a computer labs as a OJT student.

projects.title: ADC Hotel ( Development )
projects.description: A Hotel Management System for ADC Hotel to manage check-ins, bookings, guests, staff and more.

projects.title: QuckRev
projects.description: A AI-Powered application that's can generate reviewer and flashcards in just one click with no effort needed.

projects.title: Moviary
projects.description: A Web Application that you can search movies, browse pupular movies and see the trending movies.

projects.title: Timeny
projects.description: Know your remaining life according to average life expectancy of human and discover more info about your birthday.
